item.title: cowsay - ascii messages and warnings for R
item.description: The history Cowsay is a terminal program that generates ascii pictures of a cow saying what you tell the cow to say in a bubble. See the Wikipedia page for more information: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cowsay - Install cowsay to use in your terminal (on OSX): brew update brew install cowsay Type cowsay hello world!, and you get: ______________ < hello world! > -------------- \ ^__^ \ (oo)\_______ (__)\ )\/\ ||----w | || || Optionally, you can install fortune to get pseudorandom messages from a database of quotations.
